column5: 15th is yours. see you guys all soon. any questions pm me
I still remember that day that was a close call lol It would have hurt like hell if that hook had gone in any deeper
15th is perfect

I would love to thanks the 3 guys that showed up but not pleased with the forth that did not show up. A call or email would have been nice. I would never expect that from an OFC guy but I guess I was wrong. The other guys wanted to cover your cost because they felt bad but I told them no way. I think that is very low what you pulled.Other people wanted that spot.  Just my rant.
That sucks!  Too bad.   Glad you guys made the best of it and good on you Lloyd for eating the loss(although you shouldn't ever have to!).....good things to follow!  Cheers.

Hey guys got myself a great deal on a BOQ walleye charter from Fishhunter just wanted to find another 3 guys to split the cost.  If anyone is interested just send me a pm. Price $125.00 per person  When the hooks-ups are back up could one of the MOD's move this post thank you.
More info would help....what are the dates and what kind of fishing are we talking about....jigging, drifting, trolling, etc......  Bob

Excellent deal at any time of the year. You shouldn't have a problem filling the slots, Jose. I'd also need to know the dates.  I don't think the hook up section will be going back up....it's to be discussed.
Thank you Roy From what Lloyd told me any time from May 8th all the way till june I'm good for any date i can book it off.
Hey Bob i think we would be trolling but that will be up to Lloyd This will be my 6th trip with lloyd and i've always had a blast.
Roy the dates I still have open are 8,15, 22,23,24 open and its all trolling
I could do the 15th, 22nd or 23rd...any details should be worked out by PM or email.
Fishing with Roy now thats a deal
One seat taken only 2 left then we can set a date
Let's bump this sucker up.
He even has a no fish guarantee....  It's guaranteed that if you don't catch any fish.. that you'll still have a GREAT time! lol
I've PM'd Aile Goby myself. He has my contact info. Those dates yo list work for me too Roy.
Wayne i forgot about that we always have fun and it's always a hoot with Lloyd
your so bad Wayne!!! lol
Well one seat left Roy let me know if that seat is taken by you and we are set. Thanks again guys
Hey Roy
Hey Lloyd, I just PMd Jose 15 minutes ago or so. I'm in...I can back out if you need equal weight distribution in the boat though. (I'm a dwarf remember?)
Depending on which date you choose I'd love to join you guys.
Solo all seats have been taken up.  Saying that i can always twist Lloyds rubber arm and set another charter up for another 4 guys at the same price.
Looking forward to meeting ya guys. Is there a date set yet?
Looks like the 15th or the 22end or 23rd lets set a date guys
OK the 15th then.
Ok the 15th it is then.
Jose,  make sure no one snags a hook in your finger......... and good luck !!
